body.p: The asset recognition criteria included in paragraph 9 of this Interpretation are those referred to in paragraph 4.44 of the Conceptual Framework for Financial Reporting. An additional criterion is, however, also included in this Interpretation for recognising the stripping activity asset—that the entity can specifically identify the ‘component’ of the ore body for which access is being improved. All three criteria must be met for the costs to qualify for recognition as an asset. If the criteria are not met, a stripping activity asset will not be recognised.
